# Exploratory Data Analysis

## Average Shoots vs Goals Scored

```{r}
# Required library
library(ggplot2)

# Team-specific color palette
team_colors <- c(
  "fenerbahce" = "blue",
  "galatasaray" = "red",
  "besiktas" = "white",
  "trabzonspor" = "maroon"
)

# Create scatter plot
ggplot(df, aes(x = avg_shoots, y = avg_goals_scored, color = Team)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) + # Data points
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) + # Regression line
  scale_color_manual(values = team_colors) + # Team colors
  labs(
    title = "Relationship Between Shots and Goals",
    x = "Average Shots",
    y = "Average Goals Scored",
    color = "Team"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Ball Possesion vs Goals Scored

```{r}
# `ggplot2` paketini yükleyin
library(ggplot2)

# `df` veri setini yüklediğinizden ve doğru olduğunu kontrol ettiğinizden emin olun
# Örnek veri setini kullanarak basit bir grafik yapalım
ggplot(df, aes(x = avg_ball_possession, y = avg_goals_scored, color = Team)) +
  geom_point(size = 5, alpha = 0.7) +  # Veri noktaları
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +  # Trendline
  scale_color_manual(values = c(
    "fenerbahce" = "blue",
    "galatasaray" = "red",
    "besiktas" = "black",
    "trabzonspor" = "maroon"
  )) +  # Takım renkleri
  labs(
    title = "Relationship Between Ball Possession and Goals Scored",
    x = "Average Ball Possession (%)",
    y = "Average Goals Scored",
    color = "Team"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
